title: Enhancing Web Development Practical Skills: Gamification-Based Spatial Volume Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic geometry and comprehension of volume calculation formulas
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of calculating spatial building volumes through game mechanics based on the MDA framework.
Learners can accurately calculate the volume of real-world architectural structures using in-game 3D modeling tools.
Learners can solve complex spatial volume problems with an 80%+ success rate through collaborative problem-solving in a gamified environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
